overview: Bigger isn't always better, it's just more "widely" preferred. Take for instance MONSTER MEAT, you may not be able to fit it anywhere, but it sure feels good trying. Catalina Video and director Peter Romero have just released a Monster of a video. They've gathered up the hugest, most massive, enormously monstrous meat, you've ever seen. Like newcomer Maxime Cannon, who's loaded artillery is likely to instill fear near any quivering hole. But, as we've discovered, where there's MONSTER MEAT, there's got to be a Monster Hole. Park Wiley is dreaming of his favorite thing. A big cock. Actually, he's dreaming of many big cocks. And by the time he wakes up he's going to need some Monster Meat.
title: Monster Meat
